allow: Bash(docker exec scalex-postgres psql -U postgres -d scalex -c "INSERT INTO video_call_active_periods (start_hour, start_minute, end_hour, end_minute, order_index, is_active) VALUES (20, 30, 23, 59, 5, true);")
